title: Yahoo’s Ugly Death, Part 2
description: Between 2010 and 2014, Yahoo was hacked numerous times - each time setting a new 'world record' for the largest data breach in history. It also hid those breaches from it's investors, customers and the SEC.
content:encoded: Between 2010 and 2014, Yahoo was hacked numerous times – each time setting a new ‘world record’ for the largest data breach in history. It also hid those breaches from it’s investors, customers and the SEC.
